The Corn Maze

Elevating your halloween experience to the next level The chase, our brand new corn maze straddles spooky tradition with modern mayhem as your heart beats along the forbideen path. Careful not to lose your way, our corn maze will have you clawing your way out.Can you escape The Chase?
